ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Inventory

Class InventoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Inventory.InventoryController

  • public class InventoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for handling interactions from the InventoryActivity. The controller manages clicks to the "Add Item" and "Inventory Details" buttons in the InventoryActivity's layout. Clicking these buttons navigates the user to a new activity in order to complete the user's request.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InventoryController(android.app.Activity activity)
      Constructs a controller with the activity this constructor is attached to.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAddItemClick()
      Handles click from the "Add Trinket" button in the InventoryActivity.
      void onDetailsClick()
      Handles click from the "Inventory Details" button in the InventoryActivity.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • InventoryController

        public InventoryController(android.app.Activity activity)
        Constructs a controller with the activity this constructor is attached to. Each controller can only be used by one activity.
        Parameters:
        activity - - The activity this controller is attached to

    • Method Detail

      • onAddItemClick

        public void onAddItemClick()
        Handles click from the "Add Trinket" button in the InventoryActivity. Starts the AddOrEditTrinketActivity with its trinket adding functionality (rather than its editing functionality).

      • onDetailsClick

        public void onDetailsClick()
        Handles click from the "Inventory Details" button in the InventoryActivity. Starts the InventoryDetailsActivity.
